abstract: The struggling search engine is trying to win business back from its big rival, Google, by improving click-through rates.
snippet: The struggling search engine is trying to win business back from its big rival, Google, by improving click-through rates.
lead_paragraph: Yahoo is introducing a new type of search advertising that integrates images and video in paid listings, the company plans to announce Thursday.

headline.main: Yahoo Shows Search Ads With Images and Video
headline.print_headline: Yahoo Shows Search Ads With Images and Video
